technology.name: Consumer Goods Factory
technology.preresearch: Our factories tend to produce a lot, but our citizens are not always pleased by their products. Building light industries designed to produce goods for our citizens might increase their morale significantly. But a carefully chosen design of those structures should also allow us to get a production bonus from it.

technology.name: Solar Collector
technology.preresearch: Concentrating solar rays into a localized point on a ground structure permits the usage of more efficient conversion techniques than solar cells.
